body.name: Zakarian by Dash 12" TruPro Nonstick Stainless Steel Fry Pan- Blue
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 53 mins
features: RESTAURANT QUALITY AT HOME: Elevate your everyday cooking with the Zakarian by Dash TruPro 12” Stainless Steel Fry Pan for searing, sautéing, baking and roasting.

TRUPRO TECHNOLOGY: Tri-Ply TruPro stainless steel construction wraps top-quality stainless steel around a layer of aluminum for superior heat retention and distribution. TruPro TriGlide Nonstick coating releases food easily and provides superior scratch resistance and excellent durability.
DISHWASHER SAFE: Dishwasher safe, metal-utensil safe and BPA Free.
COMFORT GRIP: Silicone-wrapped handle with thumb grip provides comfort and keeps your hand cool.
COOKTOP + OVEN SAFE: Oven safe up to 425°F, Induction, Electric + Gas Stovetop compatible.
INCLUDES: One 12” Zakarian by Dash TruPro Stainless Steel Fry Pan, Recipe cards created by Chef Geoffrey Zakarian.
body.description: Create restaurant-quality meals at home with the Zakarian by Dash 12” Stainless Steel Fry Pan. This durable pan features a unique TruPro™ TriGlide™ nonstick coating that allows meals to glide off the pan for simple serving and cleanup. And its Tri-Ply TruPro™ stainless steel construction heats meals quickly and evenly for delicious dishes in a dash. This expertly crafted pan includes a silicone-wrapped handle for additional safety and comfort. Plus, we’ve included recipe cards from Chef Zakarian himself so you can whip up delicious creations in no time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic pan. It has become my favorite. No warping like some other pans I’ve had. I’ve been using it a couple of months and I have nothing negative to say. Excellent pan for a great price. I highly recommend it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've owned a few pans in my life, but this is by far the best. Sturdy construction and absolutely non stick. A must have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about these working on my induction flat top…but they work beautifully. They are nice durable pans! I will buy more of these products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well thought out pans… nest and stack so conveniently w/o risk to the surface. I’ve included a pic of my cabinet - notice how much more compact the Zakarian pots are (right) vs out old pots (left). Also like the lids have fold-down handles for easy storage. Feel very heavy duty. Love the strainer lids. Extremely happy with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice set of pans, but wish it had oven safe handles
reviews.reviewText: I have a really nice set of Henkel pots and pans that my wife is terrified to use. I used to be a professional chef, and I am very particular about my kitchen tools, so my wife ordered these so she could use them when she cooks. Honestly they are a really nice quality set of pots and pans, and I really have no big qualms with them, other than the handles are not (In my opinion) over safe. I do however really like the lids because you can strain it out of the pot by giving it a turn. Overall nice set, but maybe a bit expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mid level set that will last
reviews.reviewText: These pots and pans are perfect for someone that doesn’t want to spend a small fortune, but also doesn’t want a super cheap starter set that’s going to need replaced in a year or two. This set is basically right in the middle of super expensive luxury and collage form or starter home cheap.The straining lids are a game changer, no need to get out a separate strainer. And the fact that these pots all stack together is fantastic, I can’t tell you how frustrating it is to have a whole set of pots and pans that are not stackable, they take up so much room!The quality is nice, much better than a cheap set you can pickup from Walmart. Heck I’m pretty sure the quality is just as good, if not better, as the Ninja pots and pans I had previously. Overall no complaints here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We definitely needed to upgrade our pots and pans. We are obsessed with these pots and pans and believe that we can hold on to these for a long time. I have been telling my friends and family all about them because I love them so much. Depends are extra wide and deep which makes it perfect for any meal you are cooking. Overall I cannot recommend this these pots and pans more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are phenomenal!
reviews.reviewText: WOWOW! - LOVE these!! - I’ve got the heat I get from stainless, the nonstick I would get from ceramic (or other), and then the oven safe that I would get from a cast iron! - Absolutely easy to cook with and I can’t even tell you how much the strainer built into the lid has been used since I’ve gotten them! Especially straining ground beef! - 11/10
